title: Marianne Williamson | Donald Trump Is the Conspiracy-Theorist-in-Chief: A Closer Look
description:
Seth takes a closer look at President Trump retweeting a conspiracy theory accusing former President Clinton of murder.

Then, Seth interviews presidential hopeful Marianne Williamson, who also takes a few more questions backstage exclusively for this podcast.

See Privacy Policy at https://art19.com/privacy and California Privacy Notice at https://art19.com/privacy#do-not-sell-my-info.
